author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: عَلَى ما تَشآءُ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المَحْبُوبُ فِي الآخِرَةِ وَالأُولى لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ العَلِيُّ الأَبْهی.
translation: Potent art Thou to do Thy pleasure. Thou art the one alone Beloved in both this world and in the next. No God is there but Thee, the Most Exalted, the All-Glorious.
